title: DDFP 472: 2016 Panthers, Fantasy Football Fandom & Best Sports Sounds
itunes:title: DDFP 472: 2016 Panthers, Fantasy Football Fandom & Best Sports Sounds
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank, Patrick Claybon and Matt Harmon to discuss Arian Foster joining the Dolphins and the best sounds in all of sports. The guys also determine if it's okay to admit you're a bigger fantasy football fan than a fan of your NFL team. Plus, the guys talk about the best runners-up in NFL history and wrap the show by reviewing the Carolina Panthers' 2016 schedule in the latest installment of "On the Record".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
